dt: {bc}a table that is often partitioned or enclosed and is used for individual study especially in a library

et: alteration of Middle English {it}caroll{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}carola{/it}, perhaps from {it}carola{/it} round dance, something circular, from Late Latin {it}choraula{/it} choral song {ma}{mat|carol|}{/ma}
shortdef: a table that is often partitioned or enclosed and is used for individual study especially in a library
